content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### New Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0) which is currently processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Original Stone Furnace at position(45.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 45.0, -82.0) which is currently processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40.0, -84.0) which is currently extracting coal.

### Wooden Chest at position(39.5, -85.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position 39.5, -85.5) which contains coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or other entity. For example, the error "Could not insert: 'No coal to insert from your inventory'" indicates that there was an attempt to insert coal without having any in the inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
